pages.text: After you have gathered some ore chunks, you will need some stone to build a foundry, which can melt down the ore and cast it into several different items.
pages.title: Foundry Chapter I

pages.text: The first piece of the foundry is a stone crucible, which will hold all the molten metal in the structure.
pages.title: Stone Crucible

pages.text: The second piece is the stone casting vessel, which will be used as a container to cast the metal into.
pages.title: Stone Casting Vessel

pages.text: The last piece is a regular old furnace.
pages.title: The Good Ol'

pages.name: Foundry Tier I
pages.text: Use the book to visualise how to build the foundry, and then you can go smelt your ores.
